---
title: "Support vs health vs performance plot"
author: "Leo Li"
date: "2023-02-25"
output: html_document
---

Loading and reading it data\
```{r message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
student <- read_delim("../../../Downloads/student-por.csv")
```

```{r message=FALSE, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
student %>% 
  group_by(health, schoolsup) %>% 
  summarize(avgGrades = (G1 + G2 + G3)/3) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(health, avgGrades, fill = schoolsup)) + geom_col(position = "dodge") + 
  labs(title = "Health vs. Average Grades with and without Academic Support",
       x = "Health", y = "Average Grades", fill = "Extra Support")
  
```
